website_summaries.verdict: Electric tiller cultivates garden beds for areas close to an electrical outlet.
pros: Lightweight compared to other tillers of its size
Operates at 2 speeds for better control
cons: Edging attachments not available for this size

customer_reviews.title: refurbished item
customer_reviews.text: This rating is an alert to let people know that they are being sold a refurbished item with obvious signs of wear and tear in the guise of brand new.Shame on the seller for not stating that anywhere in original description.As far as the tiller goes its not a bad performer except the safety/kill switch's flawed design renders it unusable for most practical purposes.
customer_reviews.author: max42

customer_reviews.title: Simple assembly for this wonderful Tiller!!!
customer_reviews.text: This electric tiller has a lot more power than I expected, I am very happy with this purchase. I used is on an area that had never been tilled and it cut through hard soil with ease even tree roots. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rototiller to level out my backyard and it had lots of power turning hard ground over. This is an amazing little machine well worth every penny; highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jacques

customer_reviews.title: No gas fumes and hard starting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for home gardening. Wife uses it most of the time. Much easier than fighting with the 2 stroke engine!!
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Mcneill

customer_reviews.title: hold on tight
customer_reviews.text: needs more weight it jumps pretty hard going forward works better pulling it backward
customer_reviews.author: chester mckee

customer_reviews.title: Mantis doesn’t work, and Amazon customer service very poor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas gift. Unpacked in March when you’d normally till. Didn’t work. Called Amazon and they say no return after 2 mo. Called Mantis and the said tough luck. Really. Has not worked not one turn. Piece of crap. Poor customer service. Amazon extended warranty they used to taunt must be a thing if the past. Opened motor and wire a raised through to short out. Came that from amazon but they say it’s past their period of care. Remember this when you buy early Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Skinner

customer_reviews.title: easy of use
customer_reviews.text: The product was just as described and worked as I expected it to. It cultivated the area for my garden with little effort on my part. Powerful little machine. It works better than my gas powered tiller.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good purchase. I have use it to till a 40'x40' garden spot. Easy to handle and keep steady does a good job. The best feature is the 2 speed makes it better to handle even my young kids have been tilling with it and it's not loud I can till with it and not wake anybody since the garden is right next to the bedrooms of the house
customer_reviews.author: G. Tolman

customer_reviews.title: works quietly and efficiently for a large backyard garden
customer_reviews.text: This Mantis is far more quiet than my old gas-powered version. Keeping the electric cord away from the tiller is a bit annoying, but the technique is no different than when vacuuming. The tiller is great value for less than $130. It "bucks" less frequently in heavy clay soil and while digging up wet sod if you take a break every 5-10 minutes to pull out the plug and remove most of the clods/grass roots from the tines.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Silski

customer_reviews.title: Small beast
customer_reviews.text: This little tiller is a beast. I used this for a couple of hours out of the box and it tore up some tough clay ground. I then spread out a whole lot amendment and tilled in with the clay dirt. Did a nice job blending it in. This will dig down deep if held in one spot. Easy to control and move around. Basically pulls itself but not out of control. Small enough for anyone to handle. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Naishsr

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished and poorly at that.
customer_reviews.text: No where in the description did it say this was a refurbished item. Power cord was completely sheared. Returning and buying something else. Don't waste your time with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Sala

customer_reviews.title: Watch for hidden wires and pipes in the soul.
customer_reviews.text: I am grateful to have it for my small garden spaces. It is powerful and you have to pay close attention while you are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Larkin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for an electric
customer_reviews.text: I tilled up NH soil that hadn't been used in many years. Biggest problem was potato sized rocks and weeds with long runners. The rocks would jam the machine, the runners would wrap around the shaft. I would have to stop periodically and remove the blades to dislodge a rock or remove vegetation. That being said, I love this thing, very cheap for use on smaller gardens. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: DocRN

customer_reviews.title: Small size but plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a larger, gas tiller. I live in the city and have a good sized yard. Unless you live on a rural property this small and mighty tiller will meet your needs. Easy to assemble (even if I did have to redo one small thing as a result of not reading the directions). Works great! It's electric which is so much better than having to deal with gas and mixing the gas with oil, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Every gardener should have one for not a hugely heavy jobs but, reasonably, satisfying garden work.
customer_reviews.text: Just a perfect tool for my gardening. Very long time ago, I had a gas operating unit. It was very strong and I loved it. Now that they come in electric, it is even better. I do not have to deal with cracking the engine for operation. Very light weight and lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Almost As Much Fun As A Sawzall
customer_reviews.text: This little guy tears through the hard-pack clay soil we have on Cape Cod. Made a big difference in the vegetable garden this year. Gives a great feeling of satisfaction when you regain control of a weed-choked hillside. It's powerful, durable and easy to control. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RedSoxFan

customer_reviews.title: best money ever spent !!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love everything about it,ease of use ,how well it works, time saved , . I admit I was skeptical at first living in N.E.(rocky soil )but boy did this do the job , and easily and quickly. nice simple design and plenty of power. Money well spent. Fran
customer_reviews.author: little limey

customer_reviews.title: 2-Speed Great Option
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my garden beds, especially raised beds. The 2-speed option is great. Even tiny wife can use especially in slower speed. Nice product, worth the extra cost vs single speed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love this lightweight tiller. Just perfect for reseeding the lawn and tilling our small gardens. And it doesn’t take up a lot of room to store it. I like the the easy start/stop - no engine to maintain, gas tank to fill or cord to yank.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light weight tiller
customer_reviews.text: Great for small areas and light tilling or cultivating. Easy to handle, easy starting, and the depth 2 adjustments are very nice. Has good power for small jobs. I am very satisfied as my needs were small and this tiller fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything I hoped it would be! I usually hand till my garden and it takes multiple days. I was done with the entire garden in less than 30 minutes. Easy to turn on easy off, easy to lift and maneuver. I am looking for more places to put gardens now!
customer_reviews.author: hollikay

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: With a cord it’s tough but can do. If you have any rock whatsoever it will also be a bit tougher and may have to do several passes but works pretty great for what it is compared to a large gas powered till.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight tiller/cultivator works great for preparing small areas for planting. It has adequate power and is reasonably priced. One small nuisance is that changing the height of the wheels can a a little difficult. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zadok

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to Tilian some compost fertilize and soil conditioner Around my young trees this was a godsend I did it in 30 minutes what what was taking me a couple hours
customer_reviews.author: mjg

customer_reviews.title: Great little tiller
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting the tiller to have the power it does. Very nice little tilker
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it!! Easy to maneuver and digs through the earth very easily. Easy enough for me to use!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great little tiller!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just what we needed, since neither of us can work a pull-start machine. This one is very easy to get to know :)
customer_reviews.author: Alice White

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This product was just right for our purpose in recovering from hurricane Michael easy to use
customer_reviews.author: James Komlosy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing powered through soil with clay with ease. I did two 4'x12' sections one right after another and the Mantis handled it with ease and didn't overheat. Very impressive!!
customer_reviews.author: G.T.

customer_reviews.title: Mantis
customer_reviews.text: The tiller came with out the screws to put the handles on. Then it didn’t work. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight and not enough power. Didn’t have enough power to till thru dirt that had already been tilled but had packed down due to rain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric tiller out performs gas tillers and without pollution
customer_reviews.text: I liked the power of the unit to mix up the leaves and till them into the soil. The power of the unit was sufficient even in wet leaves. The light weight of the unit allowed the tiller to be moved around the area easily.
customer_reviews.author: David Wyosnick

customer_reviews.title: Great electrical tiller
customer_reviews.text: Other than the cord this is a very useful tool that can take care of the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Year Round Gardener
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tiller! It does an excellent job and is easy to use! Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Silbernagel

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Did a great job tilling up old hardened ground. Now have a nice garden.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: East to use and handle yet strong enough to pulverize most soil types.
customer_reviews.author: J.Walas

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, useful and fast to cover a lot of ground!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and you can quickly cover a lot of ground! Also very powerful. Make sure to remove any big rocks or bricks from underneath the soil you are using the rototiller on ahead of time to avoid damage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. It was just the right size for the area I needed to cultivate. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Easy to use. Not too heavy for a woman
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Toler

customer_reviews.title: Many raised beds
customer_reviews.text: I have many raised beds and like to work aged horse manure into them, this works very well! Throws up a bit but a tarp on the paths and life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Poulsbo

customer_reviews.title: Great size for an old guy with a bad back
customer_reviews.text: It generally met my expectations. The soil was a little muddy and the tines had to be scraped off. But it had good power for its weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sad in Belton

customer_reviews.title: Lotd of power
customer_reviews.text: The mantis is well built and works great in grow bags, raised beds even mixed dirt in a wheel barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont buy gas if electric will do...
customer_reviews.text: chews the dirt like a big boy...great for small gardens
customer_reviews.author: Vicki & Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Great if you have raised beds like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

product_meta.title: Mantis 3550 Electric Tiller/Cultivator, One Size, Green & Red
product_meta.description: Mantis 9-amp corded electric tiller/cultivator - push-button Instant start, powerful, compact & lightweight, quiet, easy-to-use, no-emissions
feature_bullets: 2 speeds allow for a high speed when tilling and lower speed when cultivating
Quiet lightweight and easy to use with no need for oil and gas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
